function.name: rotation-turnOn
function.description: This function is used to turn on the rotation function of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the rotation function.

mode.description: The mode to set for the rotation function.

rotationAngle.description: The angle at which the device should rotate.
